>>In addition to increased temperatures, higher CO2 atmospheric concentrations also leads DIRECTLY to _________________ .<< () accelerated rainforest destruction () fewer hurricanes () decreased plant productivity (x) ocean acidification () increased ice cap albedo
[explanation] Increased atmospheric CO2 concentrations will directly lead to CO2 dissolving into the ocean, causing ocean acidification (and thus harming coral reefs). [explanation]
